dict.acceptation: 居住于，布满；使住满人，在……殖民；把动物放养在；

sent.orig: Bad elements hold sway, while good people are pushed around.; The bad eggs wielded power, while the good people were oppressed.
Bad people were not looked down on and good people were not looked up to.
I don't like the kind of people who always nose into other people's affairs.
sent.trans: 我不喜欢总是打听别人事情的那种人。

sent.orig: If other people can do it, so can we.; What other people can do we can do, too.
sent.trans: 人家能做到的，我们也能做到。

sent.orig: In the city there are many black people as well as white people.
sent.trans: 城里除了白人外还有许多黑人。
